entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 12 except 6 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 12 except 6 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Sunday 16 April 2023
